00051 /* **************** operator to open/close properties view ************* */
00052 
00053 static int sequencer_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00054 {
00055     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00056     ARegion *ar = sequencer_has_buttons_region(sa);
00057     
00058     if (ar)
00059         ED_region_toggle_hidden(C, ar);
00060 
00061     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void SEQUENCER_OT_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00065 {
00066     ot->name = "Properties";
00067     ot->idname = "SEQUENCER_OT_properties";
00068     ot->description = "Open sequencer properties panel";
00069     
00070     ot->exec = sequencer_properties;
00071     ot->poll = ED_operator_sequencer_active;
00072     
00073     /* flags */
00074     ot->flag = 0;
00075 }
